name: MustWin
overview:
MustWin is an end-to-end application design and development consultancy.

The founding team has spent the last decade working at leading software companies and startups like Yammer, Apple, Wikia, Amazon, and Zivity designing and building applications from sketches on a white board to full-scale product launches used by millions of users.

They have experience building web and mobile applications including financial, ecommerce, social, content management, photography, non-profit, accounting, API-specific apps, and even CRMs. They’re adept at product conceptualization, user testing, A/B testing potential pivots, adding new features, handling growth, and resolving system performance issues in large applications.

MustWin is where you should turn for quick, dependable, end-to-end product design and development, training, consultation, and lightning fast help when you need to boost your teamâ€™s output.
